description: Iconium/Claudiconium (modern Konya) was an important city in Lycaonia that later became part of the Roman province of Galatia.

properties.description: Representative location of the center of settlement on the mound of Konya (Konya Höyüğü) since at least 2000 BCE through the Ottoman period.
